name: Anne Bunny Back Home
description:
Help Anne Bunny find her house in the underground. It is a platformer game that can feel like a maze. Take care with the others animals, maybe you can find even a bear living there.

Game developed for the Global Game Jam 2023

----------------- Credits --------------------

Hortênsia Costa de Barcelos (Lucky Sloth Studio)

* Design 
* Level Design
* Programming
